title: Tramp Hotels "Work Alert " on the violation of the lease
subtitle: A viral "work alarm" advises citizens to sink a federal agency mailbox to initiate an investigation into the rental of the Trump Hotel in Washington, D.C.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Citizens can expedite an investigation into the rental of Donald Trump for the Washington, D.C. building, which is used as a hotel by e-mail to the Department of Public Services, which screen messages.
